website_summaries.verdict: With its sturdy build, dedicated slots for bath time essentials, and an additional removable tray, this bathtub caddy holds as much or as little as you need.
pros: Highly functional design offers a book or tablet stand for hands-free reading, a wine-glass slot, candle recess and phone slot
Has a removable tray for extras
Non-slip arms extend to fit larger tubs
Eco-friendly bamboo construction with a waterproof lacquer coating is ideal for bathroom use
Comes with a money-back satisfaction guarantee
cons: Wine-glass slot isn't a one-size-fits-all solution and may not accommodate wider stems and bases

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty and well made
customer_reviews.text: Just lovely!!!! It adjusts easily and fits my large custom tub. My only wish is that the support for the reading material was adjustable to be further forward. But overall it’s well made, pretty, all the trays slide well. Really seems like a quality piece. I’ve only taken about three baths with it so only time will tell how it holds up. I turn it on it’s side when done and have a bathroom fan that dries everything quickly so hopefully it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept and am able to have drink plus ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets wobbly when fully extended which is my problem as I have a triangular shaped bath tub. Love the concept and am able to have drink plus other essentials for my relaxation time. I am just careful with it when I am "lounging" in my bubble bath.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Feldhaus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my bath tray! The customer service is a breeze to work with and I couldn't be happier with the product and service! I try to end each day with a nice glass of wine, some Netflix and a hot bath. This makes it SO much easier. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: Love it! it's wide enough for my soaking tub ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! it's wide enough for my soaking tub and the little rubber footing help prevent the tray from sliding and scratching the tub.

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without this
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this bath caddy especially how safe it holds my iPad so it's easy to read from during my bath.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after maybe 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: The tray basically came off wooden tracks & split in half. The lower side let’s water in where my kindle or iPad is. So now I have to put less water in tub & pretty much hold iPad in my hands. Defeats the purpose of the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tub companion
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 6 months and it's holding up great! It's beautiful, first off, and seemingly well made. It gets used several times a week in the tub and it's answered any necessity. The solid material-back on the book holder is a plus as well because nothing will accidentally slip through and fall into the water.
customer_reviews.author: IC

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bamboo bath caddy! It holds everything you need in your bath, and is waterproof if it happens to get splashed. I would recommend it to anyone! Please be careful of buying competitors products, as they are leaving false reviews (under my name 😳)

customer_reviews.title: Great tub caddy
customer_reviews.text: Fits my clawfoot tub perfectly! The curved edge is like it was made for my tub. I really like that the soap tray is easily removable so I can rinse it. Holds my huge book really well

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was a cover bag but still really great!

customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. It is sturdy enough to sit in place, yet not too heavy to move around if need be. The grips on the side really do help keep the tray in place. I had no fear of sitting my cell phone on the tray. I love the bamboo quality and it looks really nice in my bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package there was a huge chunk of wood missing from one of the sides where it was clearly dented and wood was splintered. Then once fully opened I realized the pieces were extremely flimsy, barely holding the entire thing together. One of the accessory pieces was splintered in pieces entirely. Would definitely not recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: This product completely fell about when I took it out ...
customer_reviews.text: This product completely fell about when I took it out of the packaging, 100% unusable and had to be thrown out.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The sides did not fit properly and therefore, would not hold anything without falling into the bathwater - potentially ruining whatever you had on the tray. or worse yet, dumping your glass of wine!
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Collamer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! While I'm still cautious about having my computer hovering over a small body of water - I've used this bath tray a couple of times and absolutely adore it. Five stars from me! (My computer hasn't fallen in yet! Lol)
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very stable
customer_reviews.text: I was actually kind of concerned ordering this because I have a tub from the 70's that is right up on the wall on one side with less then 1/2 inch of tub against the wall to put this on on one side, and it works wonderfully and is very stable. No more dropping the phone in the tub!!!! Love this.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Liked it while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I have a corner tub and this could extend wide enough to bridge the center, so that was nice. The extendable arms, however, were loose and slightly flimsy so I never trusted anything heavy on it. The arms don't have any sort of non-slip material on the bottom, either, so they would slip off the edge of the tub if I wasn't careful. Overall construction wasn't good, though - rather than solid wood with a channel cut into it, the adjustable sides were smaller pieces glued together. Of course the glue absorbed moisture from the tub and eventually the joints just started to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Crispy Chris

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous bathtub caddy
customer_reviews.text: After a long day, a hot bath is so relaxing. This makes it even more enjoyable for me. I can read a book while sipping my favorite beverage. There's a holder which fits candles really nicely. And also has a slot to set my phone it for convenience. This is a great quality bamboo bathtub caddy. Absolutely beautiful and everything that I was looking for. It expands to fit most bathtubs.
customer_reviews.author: B Larson

customer_reviews.title: I really like the tray
customer_reviews.text: I really like the tray. I have a clawfoot tub and unfortunately my tub is more narrow than the tray is when it's all the way closed, but I'm still going to keep it because of the looks and all of the areas to hold iPads, phones, wine.. :) I pulled off the sticky strips and moved them to where it will fit the tub and they came off easy and stuck in place again as well. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: KMitch

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This tray has been used by me several times a week for over two years and other then being annoyed when I forget to pick it up in the middle and it falls in two... it has been great. The book/iPad holder seemed flimsy at first but nothing g has ever fallen from it
customer_reviews.author: Morski

customer_reviews.title: A relaxing bath
customer_reviews.text: I do like that this extends to your desired length and it has a spot for everything. It collapses easily so I can store it when not in use. I do have to be careful while in the tub with it there are no skid pads on the bottom but I would like some extra assurance it wont land in my tub. But so far it hasnt
customer_reviews.author: Nzingha

customer_reviews.title: Little luxuries can make all the difference in a day!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I take baths all the time. It is very convenient to hold my book, candle and phone. Very sturdy. This is actually a delayed review. I've had this product for over 9 months now. I use it all the time and it has held up wonderfully. Still looks brand new. No warping or water staining and fits my oversized tub perfectly!

customer_reviews.title: Much better
customer_reviews.text: My initial review was not good - my original product was in bad shape, and fell apart on the first use. I was very upset about this and left a review to that effect. The company selling it contacted me and offered to replace it for free. My new tray arrived, and it was in much better shape. The arms are sturdy, and the rubber grips keep it in place. Be wary if the arms feel loose when you take the tray out of the box. My replacement tray feels a lot sturdier than the original one I received.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. I hate the little removable tray thing that falls out whenever I remove the caddy from my tub. It also broke and I had to glue it back together after the 1st time removing it from my tub. I also with that it was wider and that the book holder thing wasn't fabric, or at least was able to be adjustable. It sits back at a very steep angle. Works in a pinch, but I want something more sturdy.

product_meta.title: ModernTropic Home and Spa Bamboo Bathtub Caddy and Tray Expandable Non-Slip Wooden Bath Tray Securely Holds Drinks, Book/Tablet, Accessories, Phone
feature_bullets: 100% BEAUTIFUL NATURAL BAMBOO WOOD CREATES A SPA FEELING AT HOME: Strong, eco-friendly, beautiful and non-toxic. A great gift. Adjustable bath rack extends to 43” to fit over most tubs, with built-in wine glass and a cup, drink, candle holder, chrome book support and a removable tray. Tub shelf folds flat to 29.25” x 9” x 2” for easy storage. Bath rack DOES NOT include accessories.

DURABLE, NON-CORROSIVE BAMBOO AND CHROME: Luxury wooden bath caddy won’t rust or degrade in the humidity of your bathroom. A removable organizer tray compartment holds votive candles or bath accessories such as a washcloth, loofah, face towel, comb, etc.
STURDY AND STABLE DESIGN: Enjoy your book, tablet, phone or snack tray without them falling into your tub. Anti-slip rubber grips prevent caddy from slipping or sliding once adjusted for your tub.

WATERPROOF LACQUER AND MOLD-FREE: Extends the life and appearance of your bathtub caddy for years to come. Removable waterproof cloth support holds your tablet or book securely. Upright phone holder on bath shelf allows viewing while reclined in tub.

RISK-FREE PURCHASE: Express Money-Back Guarantee and Warranty to ensure your ongoing satisfaction. If you ModernTropic bathtub rack (sold by Rohego, the only authorized seller of this brand) does not perform to your expectations, return it for a no-questions-asked 100% refund of your purchase price or contact us at Rohego for an immediate and expedited replacement. Our customer’s satisfaction is our #1 priority!
